---
title: "2023 Season"
---

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

from itables import show
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("../assets/doppelkopf/results.csv")
df["date"] = pd.to_datetime(df["date"], format="%d.%m.%Y")

df_2023 = (
    df[df["date"].dt.year == 2023]
    .sort_values("date")
    .rename(columns={
        "date": "Datum",
        "seating": "Reihenfolge",
        "jakob": "Jakob",
        "adam": "Adam",
        "christian": "Christian",
        "konrad": "Konrad",
    })
    .reset_index(drop=True)
)

players = ["Jakob", "Adam", "Christian", "Konrad"]
totals = df_2023[players].sum()

df_2023.loc[len(df_2023)] = {
    "Datum": "",
    "Reihenfolge": "Gesamt",
    **totals.to_dict()
}

df_2023["Datum"] = pd.to_datetime(df_2023["Datum"], format="%d.%m.%Y").astype("string").fillna("")

show(
    df_2023.reset_index(drop=True),
    index=False,
    ordering=False,
)
```
